featured.text: He picked up the parrot and threw the bird into the chicken house.
They threw, jumped, and slung them around their bodies as we do today.
Irene does not throw away used envelopes.

other.text: The post office cannot just throw the mail away, so it becomes “dead mail.”
Delicious dishes can be prepared only D.…to throw away their toy guns and knives.
Or did she throw away goods that she didn’t need in order to travel lighter?
When photographing zoo animals, don’t get too close to the cages, and never tap on the glass or throw things between the bars of a cage.

definition.en_def: To propel something with force through the air by a movement of the arm and hand.
definition.example: She decided to throw the ball to her dog.
